channel.title: Remote Mount on @PSUStevens Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Remote Mount on @PSUStevens Blog

item.title: Synology: Creating a Remote Mount between two Synology NAS arrays
item.description: Introduction It’s no mystery that I run a homelab for personal and work purposes. I’m also lucky to own two Synology NAS arrays. My first NAS unit is a DS414. It’s a bit old, but it continues to hum along nicely. I need to make some time to upgrade the firmware on it.
